001.name: Bang
001.text: Some ships are coming toward us...

002.name: Bang
002.text: Turn on the emergency light to make them give way ! Press the SHIFT key !

003.name: Bang
003.text: If we crash into a ship, we're gonna damage the ambulance...

004.name: Bang
004.text: The bar in the upper left corner tracks our damage !

005.name: Bang
005.text: Oh dear, we're gonna go through an asteroid belt...

006.name: Bang
006.text: Time to use the ambulance's superpower !

007.name: Bang
007.text: Switch to Wave mode ! Press the SPACEBAR !

008.name: Bang
008.text: As a wave, you go through asteroids unscathed.

009.name: Bang
009.text: However, you can still be damaged if you crash into a ship with an electromagnetic shield !

010.name: Bang
010.text: Oh, and you cannot turn on the emergency light in Wave mode !
